ad admin.py¶

This program will create visual database pages in Admin panel.

ad apps.py¶

This program will create a app in django project.

This is a configuration file of newly created ap.

This program will create a django model form.

ad models.py¶

This program will create database file for Advertise feature.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

ad urls.py¶

This program will create necessary html hyperlinks to show contents.

ad.urls.path(route, view, kwargs=None, name=None, *, Pattern=<class 'django.urls.resolvers.RoutePattern'>)¶

ad views.py¶

This program is the controller that fetch data from models.py and send it to the template file.

ad.views.ad_profile(request, user_pk)¶

This will redirect the url to the ad_profile page, where a user can see other user’s profile through ad.

Parameters:
  • request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show delete_post_tutor.html
  • post_pk (integer) – Takes the id of the user to redirect exact user’s profile.
Returns:

returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:

render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.delete_post_student(request, post_pk)¶

This will redirect the url to the delete_post_student page, where a student can delete his own posts.

Parameters:
  • request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show delete_post_student.html
  • post_pk (integer) – Takes the id of the post to delete exact post
Returns:

returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:

render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.delete_post_tutor(request, post_pk)¶

This will redirect the url to the delete_post_tutor page, where a tutor can delete his own posts.

Parameters:
  • request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show delete_post_tutor.html
  • post_pk (integer) – Takes the id of the post to delete exact post
Returns:

returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:

render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.home(request)¶

This will redirect the url to the home page, where a logged in user can see posts of other user.

Parameters:request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show home.html
Returns:returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.my_ad(request)¶

This will redirect the url to the myad page, where a user can see his own posts.

Parameters:request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show myad.html
Returns:returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.student_ad(request)¶

This will redirect the url to the student_ad page, where a logged in student can create a new post to find a tutor.

Parameters:request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show student_ad.html
Returns:returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:render request,html page,dictonary
ad.views.tutor_ad(request)¶

This will redirect the url to the student_ad page, where a logged in tutor can create a new post to find a student.

Parameters:request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show tutor_ad.html
Returns:returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:render request,html page,dictonary
